import colors from"assets/theme-dark/base/colors";var info=colors.info,dark=colors.dark;var globals={html:{scrollBehavior:"smooth"},"*, *::before, *::after":{margin:0,padding:0},"a, a:link, a:visited":{textDecoration:"none !important"},"a.link, .link, a.link:link, .link:link, a.link:visited, .link:visited":{color:"".concat(dark.main," !important"),transition:"color 150ms ease-in !important"},"a.link:hover, .link:hover, a.link:focus, .link:focus":{color:"".concat(info.main," !important")}};export default globals;
